channel.title: 6.5.2 SIM Manage on
channel.description: Recent content in 6.5.2 SIM Manage on

item.title: 6.5.2 Sim manage
item.description: SIM manage # -SIM Card Manager helps to manage all SIM card related issues with easy functions for managers. For details, please see items below. 1.1 Add Sim # Step 1: Click on Add Sim. Step 2: A dialog box appears: Account: Select the account to add a SIM. Download template: Download the sample file format. Select document: Upload CCID self-fill file.

item.title: 6.5.2.3 Report SIM expire
item.description: Report SIM expire # Report SIM expire to output a list of expired SIMs on the system. Help managers easily statistics and renew SIM. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: CCID: Enter SIM CCID, can enter 1 or more characters. SIMNO: Enter SIM phone number, can enter 1 or more characters. SIM type: Select the type of SIM to search.

item.title: 6.5.2.4 Fee by Type
item.description: Fee by type # Fee by type to output the total quantity, service charge by type of SIM and the total service cost over the total number of SIMs. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search SIM type: Select SIM service type. Sub account: Click on if you want to search on the child account.

item.title: 6.5.2.5 Fee Sim
item.description: Fee SIM # Fee SIM to output the unit price for each number, each type of SIM. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. CCID: Enter the CCID number sequence, can enter 1 or more characters. SIMNO: Enter your phone number, you can enter 1 or more characters. SIM type: Select the SIM service type.

item.title: 6.5.2.6 Fee Import by Type
item.description: Fee import by type # Fee import by type to output a total cost report on the number of SIMs newly added to the SIM store. Categorize costs by quantity and unit price of each type of SIM. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. SIM type: Select the SIM service type. Sub account: Click on if you want to search on the child account.

item.title: 6.5.2.7 Fee Import Sim
item.description: Fee import SIM # Fee import SIM to output the unit price for each number, each type of SIM. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. CCID: Enter the CCID number sequence, can enter 1 or more characters. SIMNO: Enter your phone number, you can enter 1 or more characters. SIM type: Select the SIM service type.

item.title: 6.5.2.8 Activity Summary
item.description: Activity summary # Activity summary historical statistics, SIM management status by date. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. Sub account: Click on if you want to search on the child account. Step 2: Click Search to display the results or click Reset to reset to default.

item.title: 6.5.2.9 Log Change
item.description: Log change # Log change to output change history reports, per SIM activity. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. Actions: Select any function, SIM related activities. CCID: Enter the CCID number sequence, can enter 1 or more characters. SIMNO: Enter your phone number, you can enter 1 or more characters. SIM type: Select the SIM service type.

item.title: 6.5.2.10 Check Fee
item.description: Check fee # Check fee to output the status report, the service term of the SIM corresponding to / is not being bundled with the device. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: CCID: Enter the CCID number sequence, can enter 1 or more characters. SIMNO: Enter your phone number, you can enter 1 or more characters. SIM type: Select the type of SIM to search.

item.title: 6.5.2.11 Report Extend
item.description: Report Extend # Report Extend to output the list of expired SIMs and the total amount of SIM renewal on the system. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time period to search. CCID: Enter the CCID number sequence, can enter 1 or more characters. SIMNO: Enter your phone number, you can enter 1 or more characters. SIM type: Select the type of SIM to search.
